Text:
@ EvolGamer: Thanks for ur ups. I have a small request.. Please do King Solomon's Mines (2004)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0397501/  in small size, around 400 mb.. all existing copies are too big and my speed is not that good.. Thanks in advance.. :)

Thank you very much, I asked for this movie, and LIKE ALWAYS you came thru. Many thanks, EvoGamer is the best!!!!!!!!!!!!!
